articles.description: Aerial footage reveals abandoned tents and rubbish covering the festival site.
articles.content:
We love festivals but we do not love the mess left by thousands of revellers. 
The clean-up has begun at Reading Festival after aerial footage of the site revealed large quantities of tents and rubb… [+2486 chars]
